video.title: Clean My Ride, Flex My Fuel - Starring Ben Affleck, Matt Damon - Center for American Progress Action
video.description: Center for American Progress Action Staffers were out in force in Washington to raise awareness for the new Project Phin: Clean My Ride campaign aimed at getting Congress to raises the average fuel mileage standards and to encourage the use of flexible fuels. The campaign is centered around a web-based movie featuring actors Ben Affleck, Matt Damon, Jennifer Garner, Sarah Silverman, Jason Biggs, Joshua Jackson and others. Watch the movies as they role out each day on youtube or watch them on www.cleanmyride.org Click the link to sign up - tell your member of Congress America's energy policy needs work.
